title.rendered: Digiperform in Media: “Digiperform Expands In India To Offer Digital Marketing Training” – Manu Jolly

content.rendered:
“Digiperform Expands In India To Offer Digital Marketing Training”

The prominent IT & Tech platform- CXO Today has featured Digiperform in the “Technology” column under the headline – “Digiperform Expands In India To Offer Digital Marketing Training”, on 2nd May – 2018.

The publication has carried Manu Jolly, Digiperform CEO & Co-founder, sharing his expansion plans for coming years.

  Coverage Details: Headline- Digiperform Expands In India To Offer Digital Marketing Training Portal- CXO Today Edition- Online Date- May 2nd, 2018 Link-
